name: Rindr
description: Rindr is a platform for students of FH Salzburg to share and find rides to and from university. You automatically see suggested rides based on your home address.

name: Dycards
description: Dycards is a modern, interactive flashcard app built in Rails. It features various question types such as multiple choice, single choice or open answer.

name: Metro Vienna
description: A departure monitor for Vienna's metro lines using the official realtime API provided by Wiener Linien. Monitor design resembles original displays in metro stations.

name: darts.io
description: A web app for remotely exchanging darts scores with your friends in real time. Create a new room and set your game rules or join an existing one and have fun playing!

name: cschafzahl.com
description: I built a portfolio website for Christoph, a fellow game dev student of mine, showcasing his game projects as well as some of the 3D models he has created.
